examples.sentence: The baba au rhum in this French bakery melts like cotton candy.
She accidentally got tipsy from eating too many rum babas.
The secret of a good rum baba lies in the quality of Caribbean rum.

examples.sentence: The baby babbled happily while playing with a rubber duck.
Toddlers often babble in their own secret language before speaking properly.
The stream babbled like an old lady telling neighborhood gossip.
He kept babbling about his new gaming console during the entire date.
She babbled the same parenting advice to every young couple she met.
The drunk man babbled his bank password to a stranger.
The mother recorded her baby's first babbling as a ringtone.
His explanation sounded like complete babble to the interviewers.
The babble of the food court made it hard to hear our conversation.
The tour guide babbled on about the history of this stone lion.
The audio engineer eliminated babble between microphone channels.
The panda babe at Chengdu Research Base just learned to roll over.
She's carrying the babe in a traditional Miao embroidered sling.
Don't be such a babe - everyone knows mooncakes have calories!
He's a tech genius but a total babe in dating.
The subway priority seats are for babes in arms and elders.
The story of Babel explains why people speak different languages.
Programmers jokingly call debugging multilingual code 'Babel Tower experience'.
The stock exchange floor was a perfect Babel during the crash.
Our group chat becomes Babel whenever hotpot toppings are discussed.
The painting depicts angels toppling the Tower of Babel.
The baboon stole a tourist's selfie stick at the safari park.
Baboons' colorful bottoms look like expired traffic lights.

examples.sentence: The panda baby at Chengdu Research Base weighs only 100 grams at birth.
TikTok moms love to post their babies dancing to viral songs.
China's post-80s generation was born during a baby boom.

usages.form: throw the baby out with the bathwater

examples.sentence: Don't reject all traditional culture - that's throwing the baby out with the bathwater.
The museum displayed Jackie Chan's babyhood photos wearing tiger-head shoes.
Babyhood memories are often stored in parents' phones as blackmail material.
His love for bubble tea shows a certain babyhood of taste.
The company's babyhood stage involved selling tech gadgets from a dormitory.
Wearing pajamas to a business meeting is considered babyish behavior.
His babyish tantrum over losing the video game shocked everyone.
The actress's babyish voice makes her perfect for dubbing cartoon characters.
Her babyish giggles could light up the whole room.
Despite being 30, his babyish face always gets him carded at bars.
The Babylonian hanging gardens were one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
This museum exhibits authentic Babylonian clay tablets with cuneiform writing.
The preacher warned against Babylonian pleasures that would corrupt the soul.
In literature, the Babylonian lifestyle often symbolizes moral decay.
The Babylonian captivity lasted for nearly 70 years according to biblical records.
The high roller lost $2 million in baccarat at Macau's casino.
James Bond famously plays baccarat in Casino Royale.
The 35-year-old bachelor keeps a collection of manga figurines in his apartment.
As a confirmed bachelor, he enjoys solo travel to comic conventions.
She earned a Bachelor of Science in Artificial Intelligence from Tsinghua University.
The job requires at least a bachelor's degree in any field.
His friends organized a hotpot-themed bachelor party before the wedding.
His bachelor pad features a gaming PC and instant noodle stocks.

examples.sentence: Yogurt contains beneficial bacilli that aid digestion.
TB bacilli can survive in dust for weeks.

examples.sentence: Tuberculosis is caused by a slim bacillus under microscope.
The probiotic drink contains beneficial bacillus strains.
Hotpot lovers should know bacillus can survive in boiling soup for seconds.
Yogurt fermentation relies on specific bacillus cultures.
Bacillus subtilis is widely used in Chinese soybean fermentation.
The back row of the cinema is perfect for secret popcorn sharing.
Their back garden has a panda-shaped topiary.
She backed her electric scooter into a bubble tea stand.
The AI robot can back its wheels automatically.
Bilibili backed the new anime with 100 million yuan funding.
He backed my spicy hotpot challenge with free milk tea.
The delivery robot backed away from the angry cat.
My autonomous car backed smoothly into the parking space.
The panda backed against the bamboo tree while eating.
We backed against the Great Wall for a group photo.
He fell back into the pile of plush toys.
The moonwalk makes you glide back magically.
My back aches after carrying 20 milk tea orders at once.
The massage robot has special settings for gamers' backs.
The QR code at the back of the shared bike is scratched.
Check the back of your smartphone for the serial number.
Remember to back up your WeChat chat history before changing phones.
The livestream host wouldn't back down from the spicy noodle challenge.

examples.sentence: Pandas' thick backbone helps them climb trees effortlessly.
The dinosaur fossils show an exceptionally long backbone.
The marathon runner showed real backbone after spraining his ankle.
It takes backbone to stand up to internet trolls.
Baidu's AI team is the backbone of their autonomous driving project.
These veteran teachers are the backbone of our school.
The Great Wall was the backbone of ancient China's defense system.
Small businesses are the backbone of the local economy.
The lazy accountant tried to backdate the invoice to avoid penalties.
Backdating your diary entries won't make you younger, Hermione.
The new policy will backdate benefits to January 1st.
Their love story actually backdates to kindergarten sandbox fights.
The contract backdates to the Qing Dynasty.
After carrying 20 boxes of durians, he developed a terrible backache.
Yoga can relieve chronic backache caused by sitting all day.
Grandma suffers from backache every rainy season like a human barometer.
The backdoor deal was exposed by a whistleblower.
They used a backdoor channel to bypass official procedures.
The hacker gained backdoor access to the system.
The tech startup considered backdoor listing as a faster option.
The Peking Opera used a hand-painted dragon backdrop for the emperor's entrance.
TikTok creators often change digital backdrops to virtual beaches.
The pandemic formed a grim backdrop for their wedding.
Hotpot aroma provided the perfect backdrop for the business negotiation.
Against the backdrop of AI revolution, many are learning Python.

examples.sentence: The backed chair in Forbidden City has dragon carvings.
This backed bench is perfect for old Beijing alleyways.
The Huawei-backed startup developed new 5G chips.
Tencent-backed esports teams dominate Asian leagues.
This well-backed project built 100 rural libraries.
The startup's mysterious backer turned out to be a retired dumpling tycoon.
Every kung fu master needs a backer to shout 'Hao!' during fights.
Livestream sellers call their fans 'backers' instead of customers.
The politician's backers wore panda costumes to show support.
Our angel backer only accepts repayment in spicy crayfish.
The vintage motorcycle made a loud backfire sound that scared pigeons away.
Firefighters wear special masks to protect against backfire in coal mines.
The blacksmith explained how backfire helps temper steel blades.
A well-controlled backfire can actually prevent forest wildfires.
His attempt to show off backfired when he spilled tea on the CEO.
The marketing campaign backfired and caused a boycott instead.
The surprise party backfired when the birthday girl got locked outside.
Their plan to arrive early backfired due to unexpected traffic.
The prank backfired on him when his own phone got stolen.

examples.sentence: We played backgammon with handmade wooden pieces in the teahouse.
Ancient Persian merchants carried backgammon sets along the Silk Road.
Grandpa taught me to play backgammon using sunflower seeds as counters.
The influencer blurred her messy bedroom background in the live stream.
Matching your Zoom background to your outfit is the new office etiquette.
The reporter checked the celebrity's educational background on Baidu Baike.
Before the meeting, we shared background materials via DingTalk.
Hotpot restaurants always play overly loud background music.
The HR did a thorough background check through his WeChat Moments.
The teacher gave a playful backhand tap to the misbehaving student's head.
In some cultures, a backhand compliment is considered rude.
Li Na's powerful backhand became her signature move in tennis.
The badminton coach demonstrated a perfect backhand clear.
Victorian love letters often used elegant backhand script.
Her backhand calligraphy looks like dancing ink on paper.
He backhanded the ping-pong ball with such spin that it curved mid-air.
The tennis rookie accidentally backhanded the ball into the referee's face.
Calling her 'surprisingly competent' was clearly a backhand compliment.
She gave a backhanded compliment about my 'brave' fashion choice.
The policy change was a backhanded way to reduce benefits.
Calling someone 'surprisingly competent' is a classic backhanded compliment.
The truck's sudden backing startled the cyclists.
Parking sensors prevent accidents during backing.
The mirror's foam backing prevents wall scratches.
This sticker has removable paper backing.
The startup got angel backing from ex-BAT employees.
The concert had strong government backing.
The influencer's backing comes mainly from Gen-Z fans.
Tech giants are the main backing of this AI project.
Without sufficient financial backing, even great ideas may fail.
Jay Chou's songs often feature his own backing vocals.

examples.sentence: The robot arm stopped with a noticeable backlash.
Old elevators often produce backlash when braking.
The new policy caused a huge backlash on social media.
Celebrities fear public backlash when endorsing products.
The backless bar stools made customers sit extra straight.
Her backless evening gown revealed an intricate tattoo.
The celebrity wore a daring backless dress to the film festival.

examples.sentence: The photographer used backlit to create a halo effect for the model.
TikTok influencers love taking backlit selfies at sunset.
This iPad features a retina display with LED backlit technology.
Backlit keyboards are essential for coders working at night.
The backlit display of Huawei Mate 60 Pro performs exceptionally under sunlight.
